이전:메인 위:인덱스 다음:메인 도움말

제어 도움말:
0-소개
Upper side bar contains main administration areas. This bar appears across the five main pages it points to.
Commands from //admin1 to //admin5 will take you directly to those relevant administration areas as well.
Generally speaking, command buttons you could use more often should appear first.
Whenever a command button needs one or more parameters, you should write them in the Quickbox separated by spaces.
Some buttons will work over your target, others will just consider parameters, and some others will require both.
More often than not, Quickbox-dependant commands should appear closer to it.
Every important page have a Quickbox. Help buttons contain context related tips, try them all ;)
When certain commands are called with incorrect target and/or incorrect/missing parameters, some action-related dialogs will pop up.
Other commands instead, will display an usage guide by sending you system messages, be sure to have your client properly set to see those messages!
